com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl

Class ToastNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl.AbstractUserNotification
      • com.github.kaiwinter.androidremotenotifications.model.impl.ToastNotification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserNotification

    public final class ToastNotification
extends AbstractUserNotification
    A Notification which is shown as a Toast. Set a message and a duration of Toast.LENGTH_LONG or Toast.LENGTH_LONG.
